references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, establishing their superiority over GANs in image generation.
This paper introduced the Diffusion Transformer architecture, which is central to the methods explored in the current work.
This paper, also by the current authors, provides a basis for the current work by exploring structural pruning in diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Autoregressive image generation without vector quantization
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for autoregressive image generation without relying on vector quantization, offering a comparable approach to the current method.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper explores scaling rectified flow transformers, which offers an alternative approach to the diffusion transformers and highlights a competitive method in high-resolution image synthesis.
